articles.content: It was moments after her fighting 21-13, 21-23, 21-16 win over Tanvi Sharma of Punjab in the girls U19 singles final of the Yonex Sunrise 30th Smt Krishna Khaitan Memorial All India Junior Ranking Pr… [+3449 chars]
